WorkItem.Description:
The addon was downloaded from curse as latest addon saying not for 4.1 (says for 4.0.6) but i loaded it in game anyway. I then downloaded latest rawr from this site 4.1.4.0 and tried to import my character from the addon into rawr. It says the copied text is invalid or addon out of date. Also when trying to export gear upgrades into the addon from rawr, I copy the whole window text like it says to do, however when trying to paste in the game everything freezes and Wow just dies completly? i get a program not responding for wow in task manager. I tried copying small amounts at a time but it just says text invalid.
Â 
p.s apologies if i have posted incorrectly im not sure how to assign this to rawr addon.
WorkItem.Summary: [Addon] 0.65 not up to date with WoW 4.1 or Rawr 4.1.04

Comments.Message: any update on when the addon will be updated for patch 4.1?

You posted at 2 AM and wanted an update by 11 AM on Saturday? What?

This is also duplicating issues with the Rawr Addon.

AND we need more information, you didn't include what character you are trying to import, we need the data, what model it is, etc.
relax............im in the uk thats why. What data do you need? the addon is out of date and needs updating to 4.1?

The fact that the addon is marked wow client 4.0.6 doesn't mean anything. I can update that one number and the only thing it changes is that you don't need to check the "Load out of Date Addons" checkbox in WoW.

If you are really using the latest addon and wow client and Rawr, and it's not working, there would be an error reported. I've already stated the rest of what we needed in my last comment.

ok im not sure what you mean by model however the character i try to import into game is vendormatic. i run optimize gear in rawr i get the list i click export to rawr addon on the next window i highlight all the text and ctrl c i then go in game and right click rawr on char sheet then click import from rawr. In the box i press ctrl v to copy and the game just hangs up then crashes? the upgrade list is quite long and it does warn that the game will hang up but its just making wow go into not responding mode. There are no lua errors etc because the game just freezes up indefinatly for me.
also exporting from wow addon into rawr doesnt work as it says invalid data or addon out of date when you paste into import box. racter> is what i try to paste into rawrs import box
ignore the fact the char name is wrong i re loaded vendormatic and tried it i still got invalid data message
Please don't post like that, make a text file and attach it instead
This may be fixed with 0.66, I did not have any issues with it myself.
